name: 1INCH Token
description: 1inch is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator, connecting several DEXes into one platform to allow its users to find the most efficient swapping routes across all platforms. In order for a user to find the best price for a swap, they need to look at every exchange — DEX aggregators eliminate the need for manually checking, bringing efficiency to swapping on DEXs. 1INCH tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees.

fr.description: 1inch is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator, connecting several DEXes into one platform to allow its users to find the most efficient swapping routes across all platforms. In order for a user to find the best price for a swap, they need to look at every exchange — DEX aggregators eliminate the need for manually checking, bringing efficiency to swapping on DEXs. 1INCH tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees.

es.description: 1inch es un agregador de intercambio descentralizado (DEX), que conecta varios DEX en una sola plataforma para permitir a sus usuarios encontrar las rutas de intercambio más eficientes en todas las plataformas. Para que un usuario encuentre el mejor precio para un intercambio, debe mirar cada exchange, Los agregadores DEX — eliminan la necesidad de verificar manualmente, lo que brinda eficiencia al intercambio en DEX. Los tokens de 1inch se utilizan para la gobernanza del protocolo y se puede hacer staking para obtener tarifas del protocolo.

In order for a user to find the best price for a swap, they need to look at every exchange — DEX aggregators eliminate the need for manually checking, bringing efficiency to swapping on DEXs. 1INCH tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees.

tr.description: 1inch, kullanıcılarının tüm platformlarda en verimli takas yollarını bulmasını sağlamak için birkaç DEX'i tek bir platforma bağlayan merkezi olmayan bir değişim (DEX) toplayıcıdır. Bir kullanıcının bir takas için en iyi fiyatı bulması için her borsaya bakması gerekir - DEX toplayıcıları manuel kontrol ihtiyacını ortadan kaldırarak DEX'lerde takasa verimlilik getirir. 1INCH jetonları protokol yönetimi için kullanılır ve protokol ücretleri için stake edilebilir.

vi.description: 1inch is a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator, connecting several DEXes into one platform to allow its users to find the most efficient swapping routes across all platforms. In order for a user to find the best price for a swap, they need to look at every exchange — DEX aggregators eliminate the need for manually checking, bringing efficiency to swapping on DEXs. 1INCH tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees.

zh.description: 1inch 是个去中心化交易聚合器，它连接多家 DEX，为用户提供最高效的代币兑换路径。通常如果用户要找到最优的代币兑换价格，他们必须要查找每一家交易所 - 交易聚合器将这些繁琐的手动操作自动化，提高了在 DEX 兑换代币的效率。1INCH 是此协议的治理代币，质押 1INCH 可以分享协议费用。

hi.description: 1inch एक विकेन्द्रीकृत एक्सचेंज (DEX) एग्रीगेटर है, जो कई DEX को एक प्लेटफॉर्म में जोड़ता है ताकि उसके उपयोगकर्ता सभी प्लेटफॉर्म पर सबसे कुशल स्वैपिंग मार्ग ढूंढ सकें। उपयोगकर्ता को स्वैप के लिए सर्वोत्तम मूल्य खोजने के लिए, उन्हें प्रत्येक एक्सचेंज को देखने की आवश्यकता होती है - DEX एग्रीगेटर्स मैन्युअल रूप से जाँच की आवश्यकता को समाप्त करते हैं, DEX पर स्वैपिंग की दक्षता लाते हैं। 1INCH टोकन का उपयोग प्रोटोकॉल शासन के लिए किया जाता है और प्रोटोकॉल शुल्क के लिए इसे दांव पर लगाया जा सकता है।
